common.data_description_api_token: The API token of your Mealie instance from your user profile within Mealie.
common.data_description_host: The URL of your Mealie instance, for example, {example_url}.
common.data_description_verify_ssl: Should SSL certificates be verified? This should be off for self-signed certificates.

abort.wrong_account: You have to use the same account that was used to configure the integration.

error.ingress_url: Ingress URLs are only used for accessing the Mealie UI. Use your Home Assistant IP address and the network port within the configuration tab of the Mealie add-on.
error.mealie_version: Minimum required version is v1.0.0. Please upgrade Mealie and then retry.

hassio_confirm.description: Do you want to configure Home Assistant to connect to the Mealie instance provided by the add-on: {addon}?
hassio_confirm.title: Mealie via Home Assistant add-on

add_item_error.message: An error occurred adding an item to {shopping_list_name}.

could_not_import_recipe.message: Mealie could not import the recipe from the URL.

delete_item_error.message: An error occurred deleting an item in {shopping_list_name}.

end_date_before_start_date.message: End date must be after start date.

invalid_mealplan_entry_type.message: Entry type {mealplan_type} is not valid for this Mealie version.

no_recipes_found.message: No recipes found matching your search.

recipe_not_found.message: Recipe with ID or slug `{recipe_id}` not found.

setup_failed.message: Could not connect to the Mealie instance.

update_failed_shopping_list.message: Could not fetch shopping list data.

update_item_error.message: An error occurred updating an item in {shopping_list_name}.

version_error.message: You are running {mealie_version} of Mealie. Minimum required version is {min_version}. Please upgrade Mealie and then retry.

config_entry_id.description: The Mealie instance to use for this action.
config_entry_id.name: Mealie instance

end_date.description: The enddate of the data to get (default: today).
end_date.name: End date

start_date.description: The startdate of the data to get (default: today).
start_date.name: Start date

recipe_id.description: The recipe ID or the slug of the recipe to get.
recipe_id.name: Recipe ID or slug

get_recipes.description: Searches for recipes with any matching properties in Mealie

result_limit.description: Maximum number of recipes to return (default: 10).
result_limit.name: Result limit

search_terms.description: Terms to search for in recipe properties.
search_terms.name: Search terms

get_recipes.name: Get recipes

import_recipe.description: Imports a recipe from an URL

include_tags.description: Include tags from the website to the recipe.
include_tags.name: Include tags

url.description: The URL to the recipe to import.
url.name: URL to the recipe

import_recipe.name: Import recipe

set_mealplan.description: Sets a mealplan for a specific date

entry_type.description: The type of dish to set the recipe to.
entry_type.name: [%key:component::mealie::services::set_random_mealplan::fields::entry_type::name%]

note_text.description: Meal note text for when planning without recipe.
note_text.name: Note text

note_title.description: Meal note title for when planning without recipe.
note_title.name: Meal note title

recipe_id.description: The recipe ID or the slug of the recipe to get.
recipe_id.name: Recipe ID

set_mealplan.name: Set a mealplan

set_random_mealplan.description: Sets a random mealplan for a specific date

date.description: The date to set the mealplan for.
date.name: Date

entry_type.description: The type of dish to randomize.
entry_type.name: Entry type

set_random_mealplan.name: Set random mealplan
